title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of sold automobiles, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Number of sold automobiles has increased over the Year
Number of sold automobiles is roughly constant from 2007 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2017, and lastly slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
Max Number of sold automobiles about 4107.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Number of sold automobiles about 1002.0 was recorded at Year 2009
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of sold automobiles, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2014.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2018.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2009.
